description: The bark on Tree 1 and Tree 2 would indicate that they are ash saplings. We wish to have these two trees professional removed to make way for planting of new trees as per planning approval 19/3568/DD03 - 09/06/2021Tree 1 diameter, measured 1.5m from the ground is 9.5cm - see IMG_0775.jpegTree 2 diameter, measured 1.5m from the ground is 8.5cm - see IMG_0778.jpegTree 1 has self seeded in the rear corner of  the garden against a north facing boundary fence and south rear boundary wall - see IMG_0782.jpeg and IMG_0776.jpegTree 2 has self seeded in a gap between a low stone wall and the rear boundary brick wall, belonging to the house at the rear of the garden. see IMG_0784.jpegIMG_0777.jpeg shows the juxtaposition of the two trees and IMG_0789.jpeg shows the two trees in relation to the house. The tree location plan that has been uploaded indicates the location of the two self seeded trees. It also shows Richmond Councils granted planning approval for the proposed new trees. The plan specifically shows the location of 2 new trees, and specifications for these trees, that will be planted in close proximity but away from the wall  - These named trees to be planted are: Betula Pendula and Prunus Spinosa.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
